health.name: HEALTH
health.description: Physical fitness, nutrition, energy, and overall wellness
health.instructions: How satisfied are you with your overall health and energy levels?

questions.text: Energy levels - Do you wake up refreshed and maintain energy throughout the day?
Physical fitness - Are you in good shape for your age and lifestyle?
Nutrition quality - Do you eat balanced, nutritious meals regularly?
Sleep quality - Do you get 7-9 hours of quality sleep consistently?
Stress management - Can you handle stress without it affecting your health?
Preventive care - Do you get regular checkups and stay on top of health screenings?
Body composition - Are you at a healthy weight with good muscle tone?
Mental health - Do you feel mentally stable and emotionally balanced?
Recovery habits - Do you have systems for rest and recovery?
Health consistency - Are your healthy habits automatic and sustainable?

career.name: CAREER
career.description: Professional growth, job satisfaction, and work-life balance
career.instructions: How fulfilled do you feel in your professional life?

questions.text: Job satisfaction - Do you enjoy what you do and find it meaningful?
Skill development - Are you continuously learning and growing professionally?
Work-life balance - Can you maintain boundaries between work and personal life?
Professional relationships - Do you have good relationships with colleagues/clients?
Performance quality - Are you excelling in your current role?
Career trajectory - Are you progressing toward your professional goals?
Financial growth - Is your income growing appropriately with your experience?
Industry relevance - Are your skills current and valuable in the market?
Leadership impact - Do you positively influence others in your work?
Future readiness - Are you prepared for changes in your industry?

relationships.name: RELATIONSHIPS
relationships.description: Romantic relationships, family bonds, and friendships
relationships.instructions: How satisfied are you with your relationships with loved ones?

questions.text: Romantic relationship - Is your romantic life fulfilling and healthy?
Family bonds - Do you have strong, positive relationships with family?
Friendship quality - Do you have deep, meaningful friendships?
Social connections - Do you feel connected to your community?
Communication skills - Are you a good listener and clear communicator?
Conflict resolution - Can you handle disagreements constructively?
Emotional support - Do you give and receive emotional support well?
Social energy - Do you enjoy and seek out social interactions?
Relationship maintenance - Do you invest time and effort in your relationships?
Boundaries - Can you set healthy boundaries while staying connected?

personal_growth.name: PERSONAL_GROWTH
personal_growth.description: Learning, mindset, habits, character development, and life skills
personal_growth.instructions: How satisfied are you with your personal growth and learning?

questions.text: Learning mindset - Are you curious and always seeking to learn new things?
Self-awareness - Do you understand your strengths, weaknesses, and patterns?
Habit formation - Can you build and maintain positive habits effectively?
Mindset quality - Do you maintain a positive, growth-oriented mindset?
Goal achievement - Do you set and consistently achieve personal goals?
Adaptability - Can you adjust and thrive when circumstances change?
Self-discipline - Can you do what needs to be done even when you don't feel like it?
Emotional intelligence - Can you manage your emotions and understand others'?
Character development - Are you becoming the person you want to be?
Life skills - Do you have the practical skills needed for modern life?

finance.name: FINANCE
finance.description: Income, savings, investments, and financial security
finance.instructions: How secure and satisfied do you feel about your financial situation?

questions.text: Budget management - Do you track income and expenses effectively?
Debt control - Are you managing debt responsibly or debt-free?
Emergency fund - Do you have 3-6 months of expenses saved?
Investment strategy - Are you investing for long-term wealth building?
Income growth - Is your earning potential increasing over time?
Financial knowledge - Do you understand basic financial principles?
Spending discipline - Can you control impulse purchases and stick to priorities?
Insurance coverage - Are you protected against major financial risks?
Retirement planning - Are you on track for financial independence?
Money mindset - Do you have a healthy relationship with money?

recreation.name: RECREATION
recreation.description: Hobbies, entertainment, fun activities, and relaxation
recreation.instructions: How satisfied are you with your hobbies and recreational activities?

questions.text: Fun activities - Do you regularly engage in activities you genuinely enjoy?
Hobby development - Do you have hobbies that bring you satisfaction?
Play time - Do you make time for unstructured, playful activities?
Adventure seeking - Do you try new experiences and step out of your comfort zone?
Creative expression - Do you have outlets for creativity and self-expression?
Social recreation - Do you enjoy fun activities with others?
Solo enjoyment - Can you have fun and relax by yourself?
Vacation/breaks - Do you take regular breaks and vacations to recharge?
Spontaneity - Can you be spontaneous and embrace unexpected fun?
Life enjoyment - Do you genuinely enjoy your life and have fun regularly?

spirituality.name: SPIRITUALITY
spirituality.description: Faith, values, purpose, meaning, and inner peace
spirituality.instructions: How connected do you feel to your sense of purpose and meaning?

questions.text: Sense of purpose - Do you feel your life has meaning and direction?
Core values - Are you clear on your values and do you live by them?
Inner peace - Do you feel calm and centered most of the time?
Gratitude practice - Do you regularly appreciate what you have?
Mindfulness - Are you present and aware in your daily life?
Service to others - Do you help others and contribute beyond yourself?
Spiritual practices - Do you have practices that connect you to something greater?
Forgiveness - Can you forgive others and yourself when needed?
Hope and faith - Do you maintain optimism about the future?
Life meaning - Do you feel your existence matters and has impact?

environment.name: ENVIRONMENT
environment.instructions: How satisfied are you with your living and work spaces?

questions.text: Home organization - Is your living space clean, organized, and functional?
Workspace setup - Do you have an organized, productive work environment?
Digital organization - Are your digital files, emails, and devices well-organized?
Physical aesthetics - Do your spaces reflect your personality and inspire you?
Functionality - Do your spaces support your goals and daily activities?
Maintenance habits - Do you regularly clean and maintain your spaces?
Environmental health - Are your spaces clean, well-ventilated, and healthy?
Security - Do you feel safe and secure in your environments?
Minimalism/clarity - Are your spaces free from clutter and distractions?
Environmental impact - Are you mindful of your environmental footprint?

contribution.name: CONTRIBUTION
contribution.description: Making a difference, leaving a legacy, serving others, and contributing to society
contribution.instructions: How satisfied are you with the impact you're making on others and the world?

questions.text: Community impact - Are you making a positive difference in your community?
Mentoring others - Do you share knowledge and help others grow?
Legacy building - Are you creating something that will outlast you?
Social responsibility - Do you consider the broader impact of your actions?
Charitable giving - Do you contribute time, money, or skills to causes you care about?
Knowledge sharing - Do you teach or share what you've learned with others?
Positive influence - Do people become better through their interaction with you?
Systemic change - Are you working to improve systems or institutions?
Future generations - Are you contributing to a better world for those who come after?
Purpose fulfillment - Are you living out your highest purpose and calling?

usage_instructions: Plot each score on your Wheel of Life
Connect the dots - is your wheel round or bumpy?
Identify your 2-3 lowest areas for focused improvement
Celebrate your strong areas and use them to support weaker ones
Reassess every 3-6 months to track progress
Work toward unlocking Contribution & Legacy once you've mastered the fundamentals
